name: distance_to_gold_v12
title: Distance to Lootable Gold Deposit
description: Distance to nearest lootable or surface gold deposit. Derived from GOLDATA dataset which consists of 2969 entries for gold occurrences in 108 countries.

extract_types_info.mean: average distance per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.max: maximum distance per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.min: minimum distance per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis

extras.citation: Balestri Sara & Mario A. Maggioni, 2014. ‘Blood diamonds, dirty gold and spatial spill-overs: Measuring conflict dynamics in Western Africa’, in Peace Economics, Peace science and Public Policy, Vol. 20 (4): 551-564.
